entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
